attributes.action: Do as we ask on these petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petitions are a waste of time

I have signed many petitions in the past but always seem to get the response I expected, ie Nothing.
How about for once the government just do what we ask.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
